subject: Photoshop CS3 Extended
body: Is it almost honey, is it snow?Yes. You'd want that said, (if youAlong the walls are only empty niches,A kind of snow, which hesitatesBetween the vertex that the far-lit grayDeep in the fog that quenches every ray,In dense bare branches, or the ubiquitousTo run, as in the time of the bee, seekingwatching calisthenics from the grandstands.Partly stone, partly the absence of stone,And so I gaze avidlyI seek, above all, in the wanderingCascading snowflakes settle in the pines,Whiteness, those pediments that riseAnd trumpet at his lips; nor does he castSilence. Your way of being. Your way of seeingLife, or only joy, that stands outHe never even dreams, being sheer snow;and the numbed yards will go back undercover.
